name: Golduck

attacks.name: Psyshock
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Hyper Beam
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon has any Energy cards attached to it, choose 1 of them and discard it.

flavorText: Often seen swimming elegantly by lake shores. It is often mistaken for the Japanese monster, Kappa.

strengths: Psyshock can Paralyze for just 1 Psychic energy
weaknesses: Requires both Psychic and Water energy

competitiveHistory: Golduck offered energy disruption with Hyper Beam, complementing the era's energy denial strategies. However, its low damage output limited its effectiveness as a main attacker. It saw occasional play in disruption-focused decks.

rulings.ruling: Hyper Beam lets you choose which Energy card to discard from the Defending Pokemon.
If the Defending Pokemon has no Energy attached, Hyper Beam still does 20 damage but nothing is discarded.
